response.overview: Akis, a rich industrialist, wants to sizzle. However, because he is afraid of Lela, his jealous wife, he founds an amateur fishermen's club and hires Theofanis, a good and compassionate man, as manager and treasurer, who has not realized that the club is Akis' studio in disguise. When he realizes this he is so confused that...
response.title: Ah! Kai na 'moun gomenos!
